name: crawl4ai-extension
description: MCP wrapper for crawl4ai library v0.7.2 - Revolutionary web crawling with adaptive strategies, cosine similarity filtering, GPT-4.1 support, and enhanced large content processing
long_description: Revolutionary web crawling extension powered by crawl4ai v0.7.2 with cutting-edge AI strategies. Features: 🚀 5 adaptive chunking strategies (topic/sentence/overlap/regex/adaptive), 🎯 5 intelligent filtering methods (bm25/pruning/llm/cosine/adaptive), 🤖 GPT-4.1 model support, 🔥 88.5% token reduction for large content, ⚡ 3x faster processing, 🧠 Cosine similarity semantic filtering, 📊 Hierarchical summarization, 🌐 YouTube transcripts, Google search integration, and comprehensive file processing. Perfect for processing government documents, Wikipedia articles, and complex web content that previously failed due to token limits.
